name: Mi vecina se llama Clementina
description:
PLAY AS TWO DIFFERENT MOTORBIKES IN THIS FANTASTIC ARCADE GAME

Game

Play while your bike has fuel.

Try to dodge the enemies to keep high your multiplier. 

A high multiplier means more points, more time and also more difficulty.

Controls

W/D or Arrow Keys to move in the game menu

Spacebar or Enter to select an option

W/D, Arrow Keys, Spacebar or Enter to change side in the game

Esc to exit in any moment

R to retry (back to menu) in any moment

Cites

"How do I play" - Not Albert Einstein

"Please stop telling me to play your game I don't know you" - Not Albert Einstein

"Are you triying to copy Mad Max and Akira? I hope no cause this is ugly" - Not Albert Einstein

"This is incredible" - Albert Einstein

Credits

A game by FranVadillo with the music of Latrabili_Noctu
